name: Unicorn Splat
description:
Game Layout:
Tap to navigate Sparkles the Unicorn between pillars. Endless Runner style game.


The story behind the 25%:
As a freshman student and one-woman show with no background in coding or computer design, my journey building this app started as a fun opportunity to learn about the world of technology, app development, and graphic design. This quickly turned into something much bigger than myself. I enjoyed learning a new skill, but felt as though something was missing. I realized I could turn this project into something that I was truly passionate about and something that also brings about real change in the world. I am passionate about advocacy for victims of sexual assault, and helping them feel heard and believed. For this reason I am donating %25 of my profits to organizations like Pave. Pave promotes victim empowerment and spreads awareness of this prevalent issue. See more about Paves work in the link below.

Check out Pave here: https://www.shatteringthesilence.org/
Keep up to date one our donations here:
URL Policy:
You can access the privacy policy, track Unicorn Splats donations, and contact Unicorn Splat HQ directly by clicking on the URL links attached!
